CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: SRIVARU Holding Limited is a commercial-stage provider of e-motorbikes in India. The Company provides affordable electric two-wheeled vehicles (E2W) that provide a riding experience with redundant three-channel automated braking, a low center of gravity to improve stability, enhanced safety features, and easy charging compatible with home charging outlets. The Company has an array of intellectual property, including a patent-pending chassis and drive acceleration system. Its e-motorbike, PRANA, is available in three variants: Class, Grand and Elite.
